1.name: Tough Skin
1.details: Rampage gains a stack of Tough Skin every second in combat with the enemy. Each stack of Tough Skin increases his armour (maximum 10 stacks).

2.name: Ox Force
2.details:
Rampage spins his axe on his next 3 basic attacks, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to all nearby enemies.

If the same enemy has been hit 3 times within a few seconds by Ox Force, the target will be stunned for a short duration.

3.name: Triumph
3.details:
Rampage lets out a powerful roar, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to all nearby enemies.

If the enemies are minions and monsters, they will be feared. If the enemies are Heroes, they will be briefly slowed instead for a short while.

4.name: Axe Slam
4.details:
Rampage slams his axe in a target direction, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power and maximum health) to all enemies hit.

During Rage, Axe Slam will stun the enemies for a short duration.

5.name: Unstoppable
5.details:
Rampage loses himself to his raging blood for a few seconds, reducing all incoming damage by a percentage and becoming immune to all crowd controls.

Using Rage will also break out from any form of crowd control he is currently in.
